articles.description: The country has undergone a sudden shift in attitudes toward allegations of abuse, harassment or other inappropriate behavior and no historical templates exist for how it all might play out.

articles.author: David Hellier
articles.title: A Disney Deal for Fox Is Coming Within Days
articles.description: Walt Disney Co. may announce a deal as soon as this week to acquire a large piece of 21st Century Fox Inc.’s assets, according to a person familiar with the matter, transferring legendary Hollywood properties to new owners.

articles.title: Treasury's 1-Page Report: Trump's Plans Pay for Senate Tax Cut
articles.description: The tax cuts proposed in the Republican Senate tax bill would pay for themselves over 10 years in combination with President Donald Trump’s other economic policies, according to a one-page analysis released by the U.S. Treasury Department Monday.

articles.title: DeepMind Has Simple Tests That Might Prevent Elon Musk’s AI Apocalypse

articles.title: Times Square Subway Bomb Suspect Tells Police He Follows IS
articles.description: A Brooklyn man wearing a pipe bomb attached with Velcro and zip ties set off an explosive in the Times Square subway station Monday morning, injuring himself and three others, sending ambulances racing and commuters fleeing as Christmas shoppers poured into New York City.

articles.title: Net Neutrality Rules Swept Aside by Republican-Led U.S. FCC
articles.description: The U.S. Federal Communications Commission swept aside rules barring broadband providers from favoring the internet traffic of websites willing to pay for speedier service, sending the future of net neutrality on to a likely court challenge.

articles.author: Justin Sink, Alan Levin
articles.title: Trump Boasts of Bringing a ‘Screeching’ Halt to Growth of Regulations
articles.description: President Donald Trump trumpeted his effort to slash government rules as “the most far reaching regulatory reform in history.”

articles.author: Sonali Basak, Dakin Campbell
articles.title: Goldman Wants a 100% Margin on Some Bitcoin Futures Trades
articles.description: Goldman Sachs Group Inc. demanded some clients set aside funds equal to the full value of their bitcoin futures trade as a condition for clearing the transaction, according to people familiar with the investments.

articles.author: Justin Sink, Shannon Pettypiece
articles.title: Trump Called Ryan About Report He Plans to Step Down
articles.description: President Donald Trump called House Speaker Paul Ryan on Thursday to ask about a Politico report that the Wisconsin Republican will step down from his leadership position after 2018, White House Press Secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders said.

articles.author: Lucas Shaw
articles.title: Disney's Deal With Fox Could Solve Hulu's Ownership Headache
articles.description: Walt Disney Co. will become the majority owner of Hulu LLC as part of the $52.4 billion deal with 21st Century Fox Inc., bringing stable leadership to its competition with larger rivals Netflix Inc. and YouTube for the first time in years.

articles.author: Deena Shanker
articles.title: GMOs Might Feed the World If Only Investors Weren’t So Scared
articles.description: Warnings of hidden risks have hurt interest in grains resistant to the flooding and droughts made worse by climate change.

articles.author: Julie Verhage
articles.title: Deutsche Bank Says ‘Mrs. Watanabe’ Behind the Surge in Bitcoin
articles.description: It’s not drug dealers and tax cheats, it’s Mrs. Watanabe.

articles.author: Benjamin D Katz
articles.title: Airbus CEO Is Planning to Step Down When Term Ends in 2019
articles.description: Airbus SE Chief Executive Officer Tom Enders is planning to step down when his term ends in 2019, a person familiar with the matter said, amid a far-reaching management shuffle.

articles.author: Karen Weise, Dune Lawrence, Dina Bass
articles.title: Microsoft Intern's Rape Claim Highlights Struggle to Combat Sex Discrimination
articles.description: Documents unsealed in a class action shed light on company’s internal complaints about gender equality
